articles.title: Ola to set up world’s largest factory in Tamil Nadu: All you need to know - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Ola Chairman and Group CEO Bhavish Aggarwal said that the factory will be one of the most advanced manufacturing facilities in the world.
articles.content:
Ola on Monday said it has signed an agreement with the Tamil Nadu government to set up its first electric scooter factory worth Rs 2,400 crore in the state.
